entry.title: Buckley's Chance
entry.summary:
Author: RaspberryDreams1

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,040Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Evan knows that wish babies are extremely rare, the Fae only grant a handful of wishes per year and almost never to single parents. But Evan so desperately wants a family to love that he’s been subconsciously wishing since he was a teenager. Eddie hadn’t thought of wishing for a baby, he had barely heard of wish babies or soulmates, his parents didn’t believe in such things. Eddie desperately wanted a place for him and his son to belong, a family that would accept him without demanding that he change who he was to fit their impossibly unrealistic expectations.

entry.title: I had a backbone made of glass (and then it broke)
entry.summary:
Author: paperless_paperweight

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 63,312Chapters: 6/11Kudos: 117

Summary: Eddie replies: Cool. Thanks. It takes three tries to hit send, his fingers too tight on the phone.Then turns off his phone like it’s radioactive. Like it might detonate from how hard his pulse is thudding in his fingertips. Tommy and Buck had hooked up again. Might be dating. Again. His grip on the beer bottle goes white-knuckled in an instant at his next thought. Did they fuck in his bed? The thought feels like a fist to the sternum. His jaw clenches so hard his teeth ache. Story is finished. +/- 10K words per chapterUpdates depending on how fast I can spell-check myself

entry.title: THE GHOST PROTOCOL
entry.summary:
Author: Chickennuggies613

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 62,069Chapters: 45/45Kudos: 48

Summary: Evan “Buck” Buckley is a legend… at least among special operations circles. A career Navy SEAL with a perfect mission record and an uncanny ability to survive the impossible. Until one mission went too far. During a covert arms-interdiction op overseas, Buck was captured, tortured, and left for dead. The official word: KIA. But after a year in the shadows, Buck resurfaces in a daring solo escape, carrying with him proof of a vast conspiracy inside the military-industrial complex. He’s wounded, traumatized… and now a walking target. As Buck tries to expose the betrayal that nearly killed him, the people around Eddie — Bobby, Athena, Hen, Chimney, Maddie — are drawn into a deadly game of secrets, assassins, and government cover-ups. They’re civilians. He’s a soldier.But together? They’re a damn good team.   *****COMPLETED *****

entry.title: The Space Between Breaths
entry.summary:
Author: Karua22

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,109Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 191

Summary: After Eddie’s harsh words during a moment of fear—“you’re exhausting”—linger like a ghost in Buck’s mind, he begins to fracture under the weight of his own silence. Convinced he’s too much for those he loves, Buck hides his growing despair behind forced smiles and reckless heroics, convinced vulnerability would only push the 118 further away.But when a near-fatal rescue leaves him drowning in more than just seawater, Eddie and Christopher refuse to let him sink alone. Together, they navigate the storm of guilt, trauma, and unspoken fears, stitching their makeshift family back together with patience, late-night confessions, and the quiet certainty that healing isn’t a solo mission.

entry.summary:
Author: shadowkatninjawarrior

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 143,876Chapters: 63/?Kudos: 1,262

Summary: Evan Buckley was intimately familiar with death. It hung in the air around him, lived under his skin.It was the reason he'd been born in the first place.Maybe it had seemed like some awful cosmic joke to his parents when they'd found out the source of his magic. It could have been anything.It just had to be death.Eddie Diaz doesn't know how to be a werewolf.Which is unfortunate, given he's been one all his life. entry.title: make me brave
entry.summary:
Author: Surakian

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,890Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 51

Summary: Christopher looks at Buck with the biggest puppy dog eyes he’s seen from the teen in years, and it breaks open something inside of Buck that has him blurting out his honest feelings. “No! I would absolutely want to marry Eddie! He’s it for me. I can’t imagine anybody else being in my life like he is,” A soft smile grows on Buck’s face at the very idea of spending the rest of his entire life with Eddie. All of the panic and worry washes away at the thought, in fact. It feels so right. But he still has to ask. “I just…marriage? Don’t you think that’s rushing things?” “Dad has always been an all in or all out kind of guy. If you leave room for him to doubt how serious you are, you risk losing him forever!”All Buck wanted to do was ask Eddie out on a date, but now he has it in his mind to propose thanks to Christopher. Buck feels like a coward. Eddie makes him brave.

entry.title: it's all wrong (it's alright)
entry.summary:
Author: emonlispenardstreet

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 105,109Chapters: 13/15Kudos: 101

Summary: The player reaches Bobby and ducks his head to tug off his helmet.  He flexes his fingers as he comes to a stop, and Buck freezes.Even before Bobby says it, he knows who it is. He’d know that hand movement anywhere.“Eddie Diaz, it’s good to see you again.”“You too, Coach. Glad to have you join us.”Bobby looks around at the other UT Austin players gathered before them. "Before I get to know you guys, I wanted to introduce you to a new member of the team - Buck, come up here.”Eddie’s eyes follow Bobby’s gaze across the players, a jovial smile on his face, but when his eyes drift to Buck they widen back with lightning speed and his smile disappears. “Evan?”  Shit.   Or: Buck and Eddie met as teens one summer at 118 Football Training Camp - but they haven't spoken since. Several years later, in their final year of college, Eddie meets UT Austin's newest recruit: Evan Buckley.

entry.title: Drowned in living waters
entry.summary:
Author: Naterboo

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 85,322Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 172

Summary: Everyone has a soulmate, when they touch there’s a spark of recognition so deep it feels like your entire world is rocketed through the stars in a brilliant kaleidoscope of color. At least, Evan squints at the paperback in his hands, that’s what Maddie’s book says.In which Buck and Eddie are soulmates but still so utterly, devastatingly, stupid about it.

entry.title: Oh My Cruel World, How Sad You Must Be
entry.summary:
Author: That_humanpersonthing

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,328Chapters: 5/12Kudos: 27

Summary: There is always a before, during and after for pretty much everything.Buck lives through two of those.Eddie will go through three.Or what if Buck starts to lose time, and others can’t help but hold on. So they all think of their before and during and refuse to accept the after.

entry.title: Don't say you love me (you'll give me nothing)
entry.summary:
Author: That_humanpersonthing

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,893Chapters: 3/4Kudos: 59

Summary: What if the night before Eddie left, he kissed Buck. What if Buck thought this was the beginning of something.What if it's really an end of everything.Or what I think would have been a fun storyline to create more drama after Eddie left for Texas.
